original_text: His sons used to hold feasts in their homes on their birthdays, and they would invite their three sisters to eat and drink with them.
korean_text: 그의 아들들이 자기 생일에 각각 자기의 집에서 잔치를 베풀고 그의 누이 세 명도 청하여 함께 먹고 마시더라

sentences.original_text: His sons used to hold feasts
in their homes on their birthdays
and they would invite their three sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 세 자매를 초대하곤 했는데

sentences.original_text: to eat and drink with them
